headline: Senior Data Engineer | Cloud & Analytics
summary: Senior data engineer with 8+ years of experience designing and building data platforms, ETL pipelines, and analytics solutions on Azure and AWS.

experience.title: Senior Data Engineer
responsibilities: Design and implement batch and streaming data pipelines using Python and SQL.
Build and maintain data models and marts to support BI and advanced analytics.
Collaborate with data scientists to productionize ML models.

experience.title: Data Engineer
responsibilities: Develop ETL workflows using Apache Airflow and SQL.
Optimize warehouse queries and performance on Snowflake.
Work with stakeholders to define data requirements.
